title: Data Deletion Requested
description: Fired when a user requests deletion of their personal data.

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the data deletion request.

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user requesting the deletion.

scope.description: The scope of the data deletion request.

dataTypes.description: List of data types to be deleted.

regulation.description: The privacy regulation under which the deletion was requested.

scheduledAt.description: The scheduled date and time for the deletion to be executed.
